word:
Here comes stalking by me as I sit writing on the boat a large athletic native with a blue jacket and a blue calico cloth about the loins. The natives are, some of them, quite good looking. Now there is much noise removing the freight, letting it down with tackles into a flat broad scow.--Ms. 32, 1891. (November 27, 1891, written at the Samoan Islands.) 


                                    -60-
